text: Frankie Randall (born Franklin Joseph "Frank" Lisbona; January 11, 1938 - December 28, 2014) was an American singer, dancer, songwriter, vocalist, actor, and comedian. He was known for appearing on The Dean Martin Summer Show and Day of the Wolves. Randall died of lung cancer in Palm Springs, California, aged 76. title: Frankie Randall (singer)
